properties.description:
This Data Flow runs CRUD operations on a parquet sink using the following Parquet Inputs:
1. Primary Key Table: a list of primary keys of rows that exist. This can be both the master list of primary keys or just a list of primary keys of rows that have been inserted/updated
2. Input Data: A List of rows that are inserted, updated and deleted
3. Existing Data: The existing sink data base

The output of this Data Flow is the equivalent of a MERGE command in SQL

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		table_name as string,
		update_dt as timestamp,
		PK as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	moveFiles: ['/providence-health/input/pk','/providence-health/input/pk/moved'],
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> PKTable
source(output(
		PK as integer,
		col1 as string,
		col2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	moveFiles: ['/providence-health/input/tables','/providence-health/input/tables/moved'],
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> InputData
source(output(
		PK as integer,
		col1 as string,
		col2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> ExistingData
ExistingData, InputData exists(ExistingData@PK == InputData@PK,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> FilterUpdatedData
InputData, PKTable exists(InputData@PK == PKTable@PK,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> FilterDeletedData
FilterDeletedData, FilterUpdatedData union(byName: true)~> AppendExistingAndInserted
AppendExistingAndInserted sink(input(
		PK as integer,
		col1 as string,
		col2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ParquetCrudOutput
